quizDescription.text:
The relationship0 "friend" is often symmetric, meaning that if I am your friend, you are my friend. Implement a MapReduce algorithm to check whether this property holds. Generate a list of all nonsymmetric friend relationships.

Map InputEach input record is a 2 element list [personA, personB] where personA is a string representing the name of a person and personB is a string representing the name of one of personA's friends. Note that it may or may not be the case that the personA is a friend of personB.

Reducer Output
The output should be all pairs (friend, person) such that (person, friend) appears in the dataset but (friend, person) does not.
You can test your solution to this problem using friends.json:
python asymmetric_friendships.py friends.json

You can verify your solution by comparing your result with the le asymmetric_friendships.json.

questions.questionText: Submit the solution as a git link.
